Terran.name: Mammoth
Terran.desc: 1st generation mecha hunter, with high-speed fire bursting ability and thick armour, slow mobility is a weakness.

Terran.name: Cannon Tank
Terran.desc: The strongest combat unit of the Terran, with great long-range attack capability.

Terran.name: Ares
Terran.desc: As a single burst mecha, it can cause tons of damage, but energy overload will lead to a cooling state and cannot continue to attack.

Terran.name: Riot soldiers
Terran.desc: Shields are always the key to their survival against all kinds of attacks.

Terran.name: Dragon-Diamond
Terran.desc: The Terran melee mecha can break through any defense, but monotonous attack also makes it easy to become a meat shield.

Terran.name: Humanoid Mecha
Terran.desc: The optimized mecha move quickly and can cause precise damage to enemies continuously.

Terran.name: Death
Terran.desc: 2nd generation mecha hunter, with serious damage and defense power, and increased air defense capability, red armor is their belief in victory.

Terran.name: King Kong
Terran.desc: It has a stronger defense and destructive power to tear enemies into pieces.

Terran.name: Berserker Mecha
Terran.desc: Roam through the battlefield with the blessing of special serum, and it can easily kill enemies. But the flesh is always flesh.

Terran.name: Destroyer
Terran.desc: Weird hexagonal combat machine, suit for long-range combat and flexible lineup.

Terran.name: Urgot
Terran.desc: 360Â° attack, dead-zone free, adaptable to changes in the battlefield at any time, and its output ability is outstanding.

Terran.name: Gareth
Terran.desc: Gareth is definitely a game opener, it can clear any obstacles quickly and chase after victory.

Terran.name: Marauder
Terran.desc: The 3rd generation mecha hunter, it is closer to human form, with high mobility and mixed output, turning the enemy's position into ashes.

Terran.name: Blue Spider
Terran.desc: Ultra-mobility combat machine, it can quickly approach the enemy and cause confusion, but its damage power is extremely low.

Terran.name: Red Spider
Terran.desc: Ultra-mobility combat machine, it can quickly approach the enemy and cause confusion, but its damage power is extremely low.

Terran.name: Copper Spider
Terran.desc: Ultra-mobility combat machine, it can quickly approach the enemy and cause confusion, but its damage power is extremely low.

Terran.name: Yellow Spider
Terran.desc: Ultra-mobility combat machine, it can quickly approach the enemy and cause confusion, but its damage power is extremely low.

Terran.name: Punisher
Terran.desc: With high-precision tech weapons, it can make enemies lose their lives in front of the missile.

Terran.name: Double-headed flame
Terran.desc: It can spray ultra-hot flames with mixed blue and red fire, like a pleasant symphony.

Terran.name: Alpha
Terran.desc: The most mysterious fighting unit of Terran, no enemy can survive under his feet.

Terran.name: Humpback Whale
Terran.desc: The Terran aircraft carrier is the battle command ship, and it can resist small-scale attacks.

Terran.name: Cheetah
Terran.desc: First strike fighter, it can quickly approach the enemy's above to deliver harassment strikes.

Terran.name: Nightmare
Terran.desc: The enemy's sky nightmare, it can quickly flash to the enemy position to attack, but its defense capability is very weak.

Terran.name: Crow
Terran.desc: High-mobility fighters in the air with flexible attack methods, and strong to-air/to-ground capabilities, high-tech weapons are their only means of winning.

Terran.name: Shark
Terran.desc: The escort of human command ships, its task is to ensure the survival of the mothership.

Terran.name: Zealot MK1
Terran.desc: Infrared semi-automatic mecha warriors the best choice for the strike force.

Terran.name: Zealot MK2
Terran.desc: Infrared semi-automatic mecha warriors the best choice for the strike force.

Terran.name: Zealot MK3
Terran.desc: Infrared semi-automatic mecha warriors the best choice for the strike force.

Terran.name: Explorer
Terran.desc: Ground reconnaissance unit, without any attack capability.

Terran.name: Victor
Terran.desc: The Aurora Cannon has a massive single-unit killing capability; its disadvantage is the long attack interval.

Terran.name: War Machine
Terran.desc: The oldest troop vanguard of Terran, it can clear the front lines of the battlefield and open up the route of attack. Although it is an old machine, it is battle-hardened.

Terran.name: Ranger
Terran.desc: It can investigate terrain and create better attack routes; its only attack method is the closely guided grenades.

Terran.name: Tango Wolf
Terran.desc: It can carry out single-unit continuous strafing with strong damage power and inexhaustible energy.

Zerg.name: Crabworm
Zerg.desc: It has a hard shell, and it can quickly shuttle through the battlefield, its damage is not enough but its attack speed is very fast.

Zerg.name: Multi-eyed beast
Zerg.desc: With multiple eyes and tentacles, it can quickly detect enemies and conduct sneak attacks.

Zerg.name: Self-exploding Worm
Zerg.desc: Its body is covered with explosive pulp, and once the enemy is identified, it will self-explode, causing huge and continuous damage.

Zerg.name: Ground Bull
Zerg.desc: With a large body and spongy skin, it can do huge damage, attack method: eat the enemy in one bite!

Zerg.name: Armored Beetle
Zerg.desc: It can curl into a ball close to the opponent, causing crash damage, its long fangs can pierce through the enemy.

Zerg.name: Ant Spider
Zerg.desc: The combination of ants and spiders can silently approach the enemy and apply deadly venom.

Zerg.name: Winged Fish
Zerg.desc: A fish variant that can fly low in the air, with amazing bite force, and its tail can release deadly poisonous gas.

Zerg.name: Dragon-feet troll
Zerg.desc: A crawling troll with multiple dragon feet, covered with ore, and the suckers of its arms can hold the enemy firmly and choke it to death.

Zerg.name: Abyssal Mouth
Zerg.desc: A giant mouth in the shape of a piranha can swallow large enemies.

Zerg.name: Pincer Beetle
Zerg.desc: With two super-heavy pincers, it can give the enemy a fatal blow, to make the enemy faint if not dead.

Zerg.name: Spiked Squid
Zerg.desc: With the spiky tentacles, it can put enemies into its mouth and enjoy the taste of victory.

Zerg.name: Nydus Worm
Zerg.desc: It can suddenly spring from the tunnel, catch the opponent by surprise, and disrupte the opponent's position.

Zerg.name: Ant Lord
Zerg.desc: As mutated species from the void, it's the enemy's nightmare.

Zerg.name: Bison
Zerg.desc: The name has nothing to do with its figure. The crown on the single head has an incomparably stiff strength, which can repel the enemy.

Zerg.name: Mammoth Spider
Zerg.desc: Zerg's giant display, with a sharp blade, it can pierce through the enemy's thick armor, and its own defense is also within the top level of Zerg.

Zerg.name: Flying Insect
Zerg.desc: Aerial self-exploding warrior, it can harass the enemy in the air and cause continuous damage.

Zerg.name: Stalker
Zerg.desc: They can sneak underground to the enemy's camps and cause objective damage to the enemy.

Zerg.name: Fearless Warrior
Zerg.desc: Heroic and invincible Zerg display, cutting through the enemy queue with sharp dual ninjas.

Zerg.name: Cyclops
Zerg.desc: Air Scout.

Zerg.name: Sandworm
Zerg.desc: Ground scout, with a slowing effect.

Zerg.name: Alien
Zerg.desc: With hardshell on the back, it can withstand various attacks, and quickly dash to the enemy position for harvesting.

Zerg.name: Carrier
Zerg.desc: An evolved version of the self-exploding monster, with six feet, it can approach enemies faster and then explode, causing tons of damage.

Zerg.name: Blackwater
Zerg.desc: A fast-attacking unit on the ground, with its agility and sustained damage capabilities, collective damage is the enemy's nightmare.

Zerg.name: Quantum Spider
Zerg.desc: Made entirely of quantum energy, it can shoot deadly quantum venom.

Zerg.name: antis
Zerg.desc: A Zerg combat unit with a strong jumping ability, it can jump into the front of the enemy to perform powerful attacks.

Zerg.name: ogue Beast
Zerg.desc: With mutant cells, it can rampage in battle, and will never stop attacking until the end of life.

Zerg.name: Dismembering Shark
Zerg.desc: Zerg's flesh warriors can launch first attacks to withstand all damage, but slow mobility makes them not suitable for offensive role.

Zerg.name: Crabworm II
Zerg.desc: It has a hard shell, and it can quickly shuttle through the battlefield, its damage is not enough but its attack speed is very fast.

Zerg.name: Crabworm III
Zerg.desc: It has a hard shell, and it can quickly shuttle through the battlefield, its damage is not enough but its attack speed is very fast.

Zerg.name: Horned Monkey
Zerg.desc: With an extremely hard horn, it can stun enemies when approaching.

Spacemen.name: Shuttler
Spacemen.desc: The energy tank on their back stores space energy, which can be used to quickly travel through space.

Spacemen.name: Guard Nolin
Spacemen.desc: The sentinel of the Spacemen group, they can quickly send information back to the base, and can also quickly join the battle.

Spacemen.name: Lightsaber Warrior
Spacemen.desc: The lightsaber is their winning weapon of faith, they can break down most defenses and deal tons of damage. Their light grenades can also cause large scale damage to the enemy.

Spacemen.name: Raider I
Spacemen.desc: They can disguise to approach the enemy, and quickly switch weapons to cause damage to the enemy.

Spacemen.name: Raider II
Spacemen.desc: Same as Raider I, but with more objective output ability.

Spacemen.name: Bane the Bull
Spacemen.desc: The most loyal display of the Spacemen group, their ability is average, but their courage to fight is outstanding.

Spacemen.name: Destroyer
Spacemen.desc: Holding an energy cannon, they love to fight and can cause AOE damage to the enemy.

Spacemen.name: Armored Toad
Spacemen.desc: The hard armor on their back can resist damage, they are the best choice for the front row. The meteor hammer is the only AOE weapon they use to attack.

Spacemen.name: Purgatory Bulldog
Spacemen.desc: A lunatic from purgatory, as long as he sees the enemy, he will pursue him until the enemy is eliminated.

Spacemen.name: Aoun
Spacemen.desc: Also a high-defense fighter of the Spacemen, they can advance the front-line defense, one enemy at a time, and show no mercy.

Spacemen.name: Wilderness Dragon
Spacemen.desc: Aerial combat unit that shoots flames for serious AOE and sustained damage.

Spacemen.name: Death Rock Dragon
Spacemen.desc: An air combat unit that can inflict poisonous damage to the enemy.

Spacemen.name: Seal Earth Demon
Spacemen.desc: Strong devouring ability makes it crazy, unable to distinguish between comrades and enemies, only sealing can curl its ability.

Spacemen.name: Silver Dragon
Spacemen.desc: Aerial combat unit that can deliver a freezing effect.

Spacemen.name: Tidal Fish
Spacemen.desc: It looks silly, but it has an extremely flexible body that can use weapons to avoid enemy attacks.

Spacemen.name: War Cancer
Spacemen.desc: Absolute defense force on the ground, with the hard shell, they are fearless on the battlefield.

Spacemen.name: Hammer Dragon
Spacemen.desc: Simple-minded, but absolutely brutal combat unit.

Spacemen.name: Sidetail Samurai
Spacemen.desc: Proficient in swordsmanship, they can quickly cut the enemy, who can only hear the sound but can't see the shadow of the sword, they are the most flexible warriors of Spacemen.

Spacemen.name: Stonemen
Spacemen.desc: Although it looks bulky, the jets under its feet can take it to fly into the sky and smash into the enemy position, causing large-scale damage, and it will shatter itself too.

Spacemen.name: Carrion sucker
Spacemen.desc: Their mutated arms have long hooks, they can suck blood and energy from enemies once hooked.

Spacemen.name: Walking Carrion
Spacemen.desc: The walking dead in the dark.

Spacemen.name: Purgatory executioner
Spacemen.desc: Lord from purgatory, its red body is the blood of all enemies.

Spacemen.name: Short-tailed dragon
Spacemen.desc: The only giant dragon that can't fly in the Spacemen race, but with its sharp double-edged blades on the ground, it can cause serious damage.

Spacemen.name: Space Juggernaut
Spacemen.desc: The highest weight unit of the Spacemen family, it has the ability to control the mind and limit the thinking of the enemy.

Spacemen.name: Spiked Gorilla
Spacemen.desc: The spikes on their body are not weapons, but their nuclear explosion energy on the chest can deliver immeasurable damage.

Spacemen.name: Ice-crystal Dragon
Spacemen.desc: The most flexible combat unit in the air, they can deliver frost effect on the enemy.

Spacemen.name: Ghost Guard
Spacemen.desc: Small but extremely brutal.

Spacemen.name: Abyss-swallow dragon
Spacemen.desc: Like other ancient dragons, it can bring devastating abnormal weather, tornadoes and sandstorms are the signs of its appearance.

Spacemen.name: Pyro Dragon
Spacemen.desc: There is flame energy from space energy in its body, and it can shoot huge fire and burns the enemy to ashes.

Spacemen.name: Armor crab
Spacemen.desc: A close relative of the War Cancer, with the ability to camouflage and quickly approach the enemy.
